/-- Oriented vector angle version of "angles in same segment are equal" and "opposite angles of
a cyclic quadrilateral add to π", for oriented angles mod π (for which those are the same
result), represented here as equality of twice the angles. -/
theorem two_zsmul_oangle_sub_eq_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq {x₁ x₂ y z : V} (hx₁yne : x₁ ≠ y) (hx₁zne : x₁ ≠ z)
    (hx₂yne : x₂ ≠ y) (hx₂zne : x₂ ≠ z) {r : exprℝ} (hx₁ : «expr‖ ‖» x₁ = r) (hx₂ : «expr‖ ‖» x₂ = r)
    (hy : «expr‖ ‖» y = r) (hz : «expr‖ ‖» z = r) :
    «expr • » (2 : ℤ) (o.oangle (y - x₁) (z - x₁)) = «expr • » (2 : ℤ) (o.oangle (y - x₂) (z - x₂)) :=
  o.oangle_eq_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq_real hx₁yne hx₁zne hx₁ hy hz ▸
    o.oangle_eq_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq_real hx₂yne hx₂zne hx₂ hy hz

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `oangle -/
/-- Oriented angle version of "angles in same segment are equal" and "opposite angles of a
cyclic quadrilateral add to π", for oriented angles mod π (for which those are the same result),
represented here as equality of twice the angles. -/
theorem cospherical.two_zsmul_oangle_eq {p₁ p₂ p₃ p₄ : P} (h : cospherical ({p₁, p₂, p₃, p₄} : Set P)) (hp₂p₁ : p₂ ≠ p₁)
    (hp₂p₄ : p₂ ≠ p₄) (hp₃p₁ : p₃ ≠ p₁) (hp₃p₄ : p₃ ≠ p₄) :
    «expr • » (2 : ℤ) ((oangle) p₁ p₂ p₄) = «expr • » (2 : ℤ) ((oangle) p₁ p₃ p₄) :=
  by
  obtain ⟨s, hs⟩ := cospherical_iff_exists_sphere.1 h
  simp_rw [Set.insert_subset, Set.singleton_subset_iff, sphere.mem_coe] at hs
  exact sphere.two_zsmul_oangle_eq hs.1 hs.2.1 hs.2.2.1 hs.2.2.2 hp₂p₁ hp₂p₄ hp₃p₁ hp₃p₄
#align cospherical.two_zsmul_oangle_eq cospherical.two_zsmul_oangle_eq

theorem two_zsmul_oangle_center_add_two_zsmul_oangle_eq_pi {s : sphere P} {p₁ p₂ p₃ : P} (hp₁ : p₁ ∈ s) (hp₂ : p₂ ∈ s)
    (hp₃ : p₃ ∈ s) (hp₂p₁ : p₂ ≠ p₁) (hp₂p₃ : p₂ ≠ p₃) (hp₁p₃ : p₁ ≠ p₃) :
    «expr • » (2 : ℤ) ((oangle) p₃ p₁ s.center) + «expr • » (2 : ℤ) ((oangle) p₁ p₂ p₃) = real.pi := by
  rw [← oangle_center_eq_two_zsmul_oangle hp₁ hp₂ hp₃ hp₂p₁ hp₂p₃,
    oangle_eq_pi_sub_two_zsmul_oangle_center_right hp₁ hp₃ hp₁p₃, add_sub_cancel'_right]

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr +ᵥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `oangle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expro -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- Given two points on a circle, the center of that circle may be expressed explicitly as a
multiple (by half the tangent of the angle between the chord and the radius at one of those
points) of a `π / 2` rotation of the vector between those points, plus the midpoint of those
points. -/
theorem tan_div_two_smul_rotation_pi_div_two_vadd_midpoint_eq_center {s : sphere P} {p₁ p₂ : P} (hp₁ : p₁ ∈ s)
    (hp₂ : p₂ ∈ s) (h : p₁ ≠ p₂) :
    «expr +ᵥ »
        («expr • » (real.angle.tan ((oangle) p₂ p₁ s.center) / 2)
          ((expro).rotation (real.pi / 2 : exprℝ) («expr -ᵥ » p₂ p₁)))
        (midpoint (exprℝ) p₁ p₂) =
      s.center :=
  by
  obtain ⟨r, hr⟩ :=
    (dist_eq_iff_eq_smul_rotation_pi_div_two_vadd_midpoint h).1 (dist_center_eq_dist_center_of_mem_sphere hp₁ hp₂)
  rw [← hr, ← oangle_midpoint_rev_left, oangle, vadd_vsub_assoc]
  nth_rw 1 [show «expr -ᵥ » p₂ p₁ = «expr • » (2 : exprℝ) («expr -ᵥ » (midpoint (exprℝ) p₁ p₂) p₁) by simp]
  rw [map_smul, smul_smul, add_comm, (expro).tan_oangle_add_right_smul_rotation_pi_div_two,
    mul_div_cancel _ (two_ne_zero' (exprℝ))]
  simpa using h.symm
#align tan_div_two_smul_rotation_pi_div_two_vadd_midpoint_eq_center tan_div_two_smul_rotation_pi_div_two_vadd_midpoint_eq_center

/-- Angle at center of a circle equals twice angle at circumference, oriented vector angle
form with radius specified. -/
theorem oangle_eq_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq_real {x y z : V} (hxyne : x ≠ y) (hxzne : x ≠ z) {r : exprℝ}
    (hx : «expr‖ ‖» x = r) (hy : «expr‖ ‖» y = r) (hz : «expr‖ ‖» z = r) :
    o.oangle y z = «expr • » (2 : ℤ) (o.oangle (y - x) (z - x)) :=
  o.oangle_eq_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq hxyne hxzne (hy.symm ▸ hx) (hz.symm ▸ hx)
#align oangle_eq_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq_real oangle_eq_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq_real

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Joseph Myers

/-- Angle at center of a circle equals twice angle at circumference, oriented vector angle
form. -/
theorem oangle_eq_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq {x y z : V} (hxyne : x ≠ y) (hxzne : x ≠ z)
    (hxy : «expr‖ ‖» x = «expr‖ ‖» y) (hxz : «expr‖ ‖» x = «expr‖ ‖» z) :
    o.oangle y z = «expr • » (2 : ℤ) (o.oangle (y - x) (z - x)) :=
  by
  have hy : y ≠ 0 := by
    rintro rfl
    rw [norm_zero, norm_eq_zero] at hxy
    exact hxyne hxy
  have hx : x ≠ 0 := norm_ne_zero_iff.1 (hxy.symm ▸ norm_ne_zero_iff.2 hy)
  have hz : z ≠ 0 := norm_ne_zero_iff.1 (hxz ▸ norm_ne_zero_iff.2 hx)
  calc
    o.oangle y z = o.oangle x z - o.oangle x y := (o.oangle_sub_left hx hy hz).symm
    _ = real.pi - «expr • » (2 : ℤ) (o.oangle (x - z) x) - (real.pi - «expr • » (2 : ℤ) (o.oangle (x - y) x)) := by
      rw [o.oangle_eq_pi_sub_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq hxzne.symm hxz.symm,
        o.oangle_eq_pi_sub_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq hxyne.symm hxy.symm]
    _ = «expr • » (2 : ℤ) (o.oangle (x - y) x - o.oangle (x - z) x) := by abel
    _ = «expr • » (2 : ℤ) (o.oangle (x - y) (x - z)) := by
      rw [o.oangle_sub_right (sub_ne_zero_of_ne hxyne) (sub_ne_zero_of_ne hxzne) hx]
    _ = «expr • » (2 : ℤ) (o.oangle (y - x) (z - x)) := by rw [← oangle_neg_neg, neg_sub, neg_sub]
    
#align oangle_eq_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq oangle_eq_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq

/-- The angle at the apex of an isosceles triangle is `π` minus twice a base angle, oriented
angle-at-point form where the apex is given as the center of a circle. -/
theorem oangle_eq_pi_sub_two_zsmul_oangle_center_right {s : sphere P} {p₁ p₂ : P} (hp₁ : p₁ ∈ s) (hp₂ : p₂ ∈ s)
    (h : p₁ ≠ p₂) : (oangle) p₁ s.center p₂ = real.pi - «expr • » (2 : ℤ) ((oangle) p₂ p₁ s.center) := by
  rw [oangle_eq_pi_sub_two_zsmul_oangle_center_left hp₁ hp₂ h,
    oangle_eq_oangle_of_dist_eq (dist_center_eq_dist_center_of_mem_sphere' hp₂ hp₁)]
#align oangle_eq_pi_sub_two_zsmul_oangle_center_right oangle_eq_pi_sub_two_zsmul_oangle_center_right

    (h : p₁ ≠ p₂) : (oangle) p₁ s.center p₂ = real.pi - «expr • » (2 : ℤ) ((oangle) s.center p₂ p₁) := by

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `oangle -/
/-- Angle at center of a circle equals twice angle at circumference, oriented angle version. -/
theorem oangle_center_eq_two_zsmul_oangle {s : sphere P} {p₁ p₂ p₃ : P} (hp₁ : p₁ ∈ s) (hp₂ : p₂ ∈ s) (hp₃ : p₃ ∈ s)
    (hp₂p₁ : p₂ ≠ p₁) (hp₂p₃ : p₂ ≠ p₃) : (oangle) p₁ s.center p₃ = «expr • » (2 : ℤ) ((oangle) p₁ p₂ p₃) :=
  by
  rw [mem_sphere, @dist_eq_norm_vsub V] at hp₁ hp₂ hp₃
  rw [oangle, oangle, (expro).oangle_eq_two_zsmul_oangle_sub_of_norm_eq_real _ _ hp₂ hp₁ hp₃] <;> simp [hp₂p₁, hp₂p₃]

mem_circumsphere_of_two_zsmul_oangle_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `oangle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `oangle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `oangle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `oangle -/
/-- Given a triangle, and a fourth point such that twice the angle between two points of the
triangle at that fourth point equals twice the third angle of the triangle, the fourth point
lies in the circumsphere of the triangle. -/
theorem mem_circumsphere_of_two_zsmul_oangle_eq {t : Triangle (exprℝ) P} {p : P} {i₁ i₂ i₃ : Fin 3} (h₁₂ : i₁ ≠ i₂)
    (h₁₃ : i₁ ≠ i₃) (h₂₃ : i₂ ≠ i₃)
    (h :
      «expr • » (2 : ℤ) ((oangle) (t.points i₁) p (t.points i₃)) =
        «expr • » (2 : ℤ) ((oangle) (t.points i₁) (t.points i₂) (t.points i₃))) :
    p ∈ t.circumsphere := by
  let t'p : Fin 3 → P := Function.update t.points i₂ p
  have h₁ : t'p i₁ = t.points i₁ := by simp [t'p, h₁₂]
  have h₂ : t'p i₂ = p := by simp [t'p]
  have h₃ : t'p i₃ = t.points i₃ := by simp [t'p, h₂₃.symm]
  have ha : AffineIndependent (exprℝ) t'p :=
    by
    rw [affineIndependent_iff_not_collinear_of_ne h₁₂ h₁₃ h₂₃, h₁, h₂, h₃, collinear_iff_of_two_zsmul_oangle_eq h, ←
      affineIndependent_iff_not_collinear_of_ne h₁₂ h₁₃ h₂₃]
    exact t.independent
  let t' : triangle (exprℝ) P := ⟨t'p, ha⟩
  have h₁' : t'.points i₁ = t.points i₁ := h₁
  have h₂' : t'.points i₂ = p := h₂
  have h₃' : t'.points i₃ = t.points i₃ := h₃
  have h' :
    «expr • » (2 : ℤ) ((oangle) (t'.points i₁) (t'.points i₂) (t'.points i₃)) =
      «expr • » (2 : ℤ) ((oangle) (t.points i₁) (t.points i₂) (t.points i₃)) :=
    by rwa [h₁', h₂', h₃']
  rw [← circumsphere_eq_circumsphere_of_eq_of_eq_of_two_zsmul_oangle_eq h₁₂ h₁₃ h₂₃ h₁' h₃' h', ← h₂']
  exact simplex.mem_circumsphere _ _
#align mem_circumsphere_of_two_zsmul_oangle_eq mem_circumsphere_of_two_zsmul_oangle_eq

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr +ᵥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `oangle -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expro -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `real.pi -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr -ᵥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- The circumcenter of a triangle may be expressed explicitly as a multiple (by half the inverse
of the tangent of the angle at one of the vertices) of a `π / 2` rotation of the vector between
the other two vertices, plus the midpoint of those vertices. -/
theorem inv_tan_div_two_smul_rotation_pi_div_two_vadd_midpoint_eq_circumcenter (t : Triangle (exprℝ) P)
    {i₁ i₂ i₃ : Fin 3} (h₁₂ : i₁ ≠ i₂) (h₁₃ : i₁ ≠ i₃) (h₂₃ : i₂ ≠ i₃) :
    «expr +ᵥ »
        («expr • » ((real.angle.tan ((oangle) (t.points i₁) (t.points i₂) (t.points i₃)))⁻¹ / 2)
          ((expro).rotation (real.pi / 2 : exprℝ) («expr -ᵥ » (t.points i₃) (t.points i₁))))
        (midpoint (exprℝ) (t.points i₁) (t.points i₃)) =
      t.circumcenter :=
  sphere.inv_tan_div_two_smul_rotation_pi_div_two_vadd_midpoint_eq_center (t.mem_circumsphere _) (t.mem_circumsphere _)
    (t.mem_circumsphere _) (t.independent.injective.ne h₁₂) (t.independent.injective.ne h₁₃)
    (t.independent.injective.ne h₂₃)
#align inv_tan_div_two_smul_rotation_pi_div_two_vadd_midpoint_eq_circumcenter inv_tan_div_two_smul_rotation_pi_div_two_vadd_midpoint_eq_circumcenter

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr +ᵥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/

  by
  by_cases hc : Collinear (exprℝ) ({p₁, p₂, p₄} : Set P)
  · by_cases he : p₁ = p₄
    · rw [he, Set.insert_eq_self.2 (Set.mem_insert_of_mem _ (Set.mem_insert_of_mem _ (Set.mem_singleton _)))]
      by_cases hl : Collinear (exprℝ) ({p₂, p₃, p₄} : Set P)
      · exact or.inr hl

        ⟨«expr![ ,]» "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr![ ,]»",
          affineIndependent_iff_not_collinear_set.2 hl⟩
      rw [cospherical_iff_exists_sphere]
      refine' ⟨t.circumsphere, _⟩
      simp_rw [Set.insert_subset, Set.singleton_subset_iff]
      exact ⟨t.mem_circumsphere 0, t.mem_circumsphere 1, t.mem_circumsphere 2⟩
    have hc' : Collinear (exprℝ) ({p₁, p₃, p₄} : Set P) := by rwa [← collinear_iff_of_two_zsmul_oangle_eq h]
    refine' or.inr _
    rw [Set.insert_comm p₁ p₂] at hc
    rwa [Set.insert_comm p₁ p₂,
      hc'.collinear_insert_iff_of_ne (Set.mem_insert _ _)
        (Set.mem_insert_of_mem _ (Set.mem_insert_of_mem _ (Set.mem_singleton _))) he]
  · exact or.inl (cospherical_of_two_zsmul_oangle_eq_of_not_collinear h hc)
